cards.title: The Memory Palace
cards.description: Test your ability to memorize and recall information under pressure.
cards.challenge: Look around the room for 30 seconds, then close your eyes and name 10 specific objects you saw, including their colors.

cards.title: Riddle Master
cards.description: Solve this riddle to prove your logical thinking skills.
cards.challenge: I have cities, but no houses. I have mountains, but no trees. I have water, but no fish. What am I?

cards.title: Speed Calculator
cards.description: Quick mental math under time pressure.
cards.challenge: Calculate this in your head within 15 seconds: (17 × 8) + (23 × 4) - (15 × 6)

cards.title: Story Weaver
cards.description: Create an engaging story using specific elements.
cards.challenge: Tell a 2-minute story that includes: a purple elephant, a time machine, and a recipe for disaster.

cards.title: Pattern Detective
cards.description: Identify the hidden pattern in this sequence.
cards.challenge: What comes next in this sequence: 2, 6, 12, 20, 30, ?

cards.title: Word Wizard
cards.description: Demonstrate your vocabulary and word skills.
cards.challenge: Name 8 words that contain all 5 vowels (A, E, I, O, U) in any order.

cards.title: Balance Master
cards.challenge: Stand on one foot with your eyes closed for 45 seconds while reciting the alphabet backwards.

cards.title: Code Breaker
cards.challenge: Decode this Caesar cipher (shift of 3): 'WKH TXLFN EURZQ IRA MXPSV RYHU WKH ODCB GRJ'

cards.title: Improvisation Station
cards.description: Think on your feet with this improvisation task.
cards.challenge: You're a salesperson trying to sell a broken umbrella to someone during a thunderstorm. Convince them in 60 seconds.

cards.title: Geography Guru
cards.description: Test your knowledge of world geography.
cards.challenge: Name 5 countries that start with the letter 'B', their capitals, and one interesting fact about each.

cards.title: Logic Grid
cards.description: Solve this logic puzzle step by step.
cards.challenge: Three friends have different pets. Alex doesn't have a cat. The person with a dog is older than Bailey. Charlie is younger than the cat owner. Who has which pet?

cards.title: Rhyme Time
cards.challenge: Compose a 4-line poem about coffee that rhymes and makes people want to drink it.

cards.title: Number Ninja
cards.description: Advanced calculations using only your mind.
cards.challenge: What is 15% of 240, plus 25% of 160, minus 10% of 300?

cards.title: Trivia Lightning
cards.challenge: Answer quickly: What gas do plants absorb during photosynthesis? Which planet is known as the Red Planet? Who painted the Mona Lisa?

cards.title: Tongue Twister Terror
cards.challenge: Say this 5 times fast without mistakes: 'Six sick slick slim sycamore saplings'
